title: Are there management seats in PES
content:
Are there management seats in PES for MCA 

I messed up the interview very bad as I was sick and couldn't prepare well and the teacher couldn't hear me properly and stuff

I mailed them and asked if I can try the interview again they said no but can I just apply again will they notice?

comments.body: Wait,do they conduct interviwes for mca.?? How did you go, i mean i dont think they conduct interview for pgcet srudents ,right.??

They take like 200 students to pessat the rest is pgcet i think like 260 seats 
there are 460 seats in total this time when i went and asked 
Some people say the management seats are available there but when I asked in the college they said no

Yeah, pesu ain't giving a shit when you go ask them about seats directly at college, idk why tho, but these people don't even allow us inside the building, I've seen a lotta people experienceing that, also I'm bout to join there for btech, but I'm worried whether to go there ask bout admission procedure directly or not , cuz of their ill-treatmentÂ
